event.title: was discovered in the region, in 1862

data.event: It was founded after coal was discovered in the region, in 1862; this led to an influx of immigrants, eager to capitalize on this important natural resource.
Trinidad was officially incorporated in 1876, just a few months before Colorado became a state.

event.title: a few months before Colorado became

data.event: Trinidad was officially incorporated in 1876, just a few months before Colorado became a state.
An important milestone for the town occurred in 1878, when the Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railway reached Trinidad, making it easier for goods to be shipped from distant locations.

event.title: served as the town's marshal in 1882

data.event: In the 1880s, Trinidad became home to a number of well-known people, including Bat Masterson, who briefly served as the town's marshal in 1882.

event.title: 1900, the population of Trinidad had grown

data.event: By 1900, the population of Trinidad had grown to 7,500.

event.title: now home to two English-language newspapers, and one that was published

data.event: It was now home to two English-language newspapers, and one that was published in Spanish.
